Franz Liszt

Ungarischer Romanzero, S. 241a

1853 · LW A180 · R. –

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 29'

  • 2. A minor
  • 3. A minor
  • 5. D minor
  • 6. A major
  • 7. A major
  • 8. D minor
  • 9. A major
  • 10. G minor
  • 11. F major

This set comprises eighteen pieces of varying states of completeness. The New Liszt Edition includes only the eight finished pieces, which are given here.

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · II/10 · Z. A/B 12399 · Free Arrangements X · ed. László Martos / Imre Sulyok [nos. 2–3 and 5–11]

8. D minor

Liszt used the same theme in the second of the Two Hungarian Recruiting Songs (S. 241; LW A11; R. 107).

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
